mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM( SELECT CAST((SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM+1) AS UNSIGNED) AS rnum ,COM.COM_NO ,COM.COM_ID ,COM.COM_NM ,COM.COM_CNM ,COM.COM_TYPE ,COM.COM_TR_CD ,COM.COM_TR_GRP_CD ,COM.COM_RK ,COM.COM_PRD_ST ,COM.COM_PRD_ED FROM COM_MASTER COM JOIN (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) r WHERE COM.USE_YN ='Y' ORDER BY rnum DESC ) A WHERE 1=1 LIMIT #{pageScale} OFFSET #{begin}
